1.title: Personal Website
1.subtitle: Website to archive my writings and document software projects
1.excerpt: Hello, World! I have created my personal website, yay! This is a website for sharing my ideas, findings, and creations with the intention of educating both the readers and myself.

2.title: Bank Statement Cleaner
2.subtitle: How to start investigating our earnings and expenses so that we can make more sound financial decisions?
2.excerpt: A program that processes bank statements and outputs structured data that can be used to create a personal cash flow statement, which is the foundation of a budget.
